pr_title: Add ShardingSphereChaos CRD and convert chaos to Chaos Mesh logic in Reconcile function
pr_body:
1. Add basic convert type: Selector,Pod Chaos,Network Chaos,WorkFlow.
2. Add convert functions in Controller.Add convert and create chaos logic in Reconcile function.
3. Add ChaoKind Enums

I have tested it usage in kubenetes environment.It works well As expected.

#272

### Type of change:

<!-- Please delete options that are not relevant. -->

- [ ] change docker images and push to dockerhub
- [ ] change images for job default use

### What this PR does / why we need it:
<!--- Why is this change required? What problem does it solve? -->
<!--- If it fixes an open issue, please link to the issue here. -->

pr_title: add event and status.phase to control resource create check
pr_body:
- [ ] add event to show sschaos info or warn
- [ ] add status.phase to controller sschaos create resource time 

#272
pr_review_comments: [{'comment_id': 1168418133, 'comment_body': 'Rename to `Unknown` since it is a common word', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 17, 9, 24, 42, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mlycore', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1168419501, 'comment_body': 'The phase should be a single word to describe, so it will be easier to know the phase transition procedure.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 17, 9, 25, 53, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mlycore', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1168421080, 'comment_body': 'The `entrypoint` should be placed at the last line of the Dockerfile. It is the `entry point` of this docker image. Any commands wants to be executed in this image could be injected by the runtime platform.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 17, 9, 27, 21, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mlycore', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1168422457, 'comment_body': 'I may not suggest to put these messages as consts. Actually, this could be wrapped in a function matter.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 17, 9, 28, 31, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mlycore', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_title: feat: add verify Spec && update reconcile logic
pr_body:
### Type of change:

- [ ] Bugfix
- [x] New feature provided
- [ ] Improve performance
- [ ] Backport patches

### What this PR does / why we need it:

refrence issue: #290 

### Pre-submission checklist:

* [ ] Did you explain what problem does this PR solve? Or what new features have been added?
* [ ] Have you added corresponding test cases?
* [ ] Have you modified the corresponding document?

#272
pr_review_comments:
[{'comment_id': 1172428707, 'comment_body': "Use plural to keep it's semantic. Please update `Result` to `Results`.", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 20, 11, 2, 13, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'mlycore', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173425900, 'comment_body': '1. recommend to use `rJob, err` as return values.  if `err == nil && rJob == nil` equals ` !found`.
2. if  `err == nil` and `!found` this  will returns `nil` err, make sure this is want you want to returns.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 40, 18, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173429767, 'comment_body': 'i think use `boolean` to set the type of `rJob.Status.Failed` is more simple if the value of Failed can just be 0 or 1.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 43, 14, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173435898, 'comment_body': 'renamed `SetDefault` to `setDefault` if this function will not be called out of package.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 47, 25, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173438890, 'comment_body': '1. No need to check the length of `ssChaos.Status.Result`. (BTW: `len` of a slice will not be less than `0`, just `len() == 0` is enough.)
2.  Check `ssChaos.Status.Result` is `nil` first, otherwise this may get `panic`. 
', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 49, 38, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173446763, 'comment_body': 'use pointer is more safe and efficient `r := &ssChaos.Status.Result[i]` ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 55, 20, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173452738, 'comment_body': '`isResultExist` is more readable for the func, coz you want to get a boolean value.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 59, 7, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173454549, 'comment_body': 'use a pointer is a better choice.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 7, 59, 58, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173460175, 'comment_body': 'you mean `podNamespacedName` ?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 3, 22, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173461026, 'comment_body': 'set `Verify` as const is better.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 4, 15, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173468192, 'comment_body': '`rJob.Status.Succeeded == 1` `result.Success = true` 
unify format if is possible', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 11, 27, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173470053, 'comment_body': 'use `Detail` instead of `Details` if is not a list.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 13, 22, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173470758, 'comment_body': 'the same problem above.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 14, 5, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173480330, 'comment_body': 'this is used to get the first `pod` from `pods`? will the `pod` be `nil`?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 22, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173485007, 'comment_body': 'set `results` as first args and `r` as the second, this func will be used like `append(alist, aelement)`', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 26, 44, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173487580, 'comment_body': 'what are these code for ? update results? ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 29, 16, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173496469, 'comment_body': 'i saw that `reconcile.UpdateJob` will return nil, nil if job no need to update, it is as your expect? the name of `UpdateJob` makes me confused.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 36, 47, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173503988, 'comment_body': 'rJob type is k8s batchV1.job,I can not change it', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 43, 37, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173504815, 'comment_body': 'sure', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 44, 16, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173508309, 'comment_body': 'solved', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 47, 29, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173512833, 'comment_body': 'solved', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 51, 30, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173514757, 'comment_body': 'yes,i will change it', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 52, 47, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173519804, 'comment_body': 'solved', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 56, 3, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173520996, 'comment_body': 'i can not change rJob ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 56, 54, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173523555, 'comment_body': 'solved
', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 8, 58, 56, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1173526498, 'comment_body': 'i can not change rJob', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 21, 9, 1, 23, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'moomman', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1174818081, 'comment_body': 'use switch case is better
```go
switch ssChaos.Status.Phase {
	case "", sschaosv1alpha1.PhaseBeforeExperiment, sschaosv1alpha1.PhaseAfterExperiment:
		nowInjectRequirement = reconcile.Experimental
	case sschaosv1alpha1.PhaseInChaos:
		nowInjectRequirement = reconcile.Pressure
	case sschaosv1alpha1.PhaseRecoveredChaos:
		nowInjectRequirement = reconcile.Verify
	}
```', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 24, 5, 58, 58, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1174821379, 'comment_body': "no need to determine `len(ssChaos.Status.Result) == 0`, coz it's equals `ssChaos.Status.Result = []sschaosv1alpha1.Result{}`
", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 24, 6, 3, 17, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1174822929, 'comment_body': 'equals `strings.HasPrefix(r.Detail.Msg, VerifyJobCheck)` ?', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 24, 6, 5, 52, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1174830592, 'comment_body': 'move err check to where it created.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 24, 6, 17, 55, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1174832504, 'comment_body': 'check if  `pods.Item`  is empty first.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 24, 6, 21, 1, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 1174834731, 'comment_body': 'maybe `isJobChanged` is a better name ', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2023, 4, 24, 6, 24, 11, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'Xu-Wentao', 'type': 'User'}]

pr_title: issue266: expose metrics annotations throught ShardingSphere Proxy Helm
pr_body:
fix issue266 by add metrics annotations in proxy helm chart

1.by `.Values.compute.agent.enabled ` in deployment.spec.template.metadata.annotations to control metrics start or not
2.     
 ```
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "9090"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
```
add those annotations to expose it
